column2:
"It's the same as rumour has it. And it's
also how I've imagined it!"

"I won't know it for sure without
dissecting it but I think there's no doubt
about it based on the appearance."

"I will prepare the dish immediately
while it is still fresh.
Thanks again for the help this time!"

"噂に聞いていたとおりね。
しかも私がイメージしたとおり！"

"さばいてみないとわからないけど
見た感じに間違いはないわ。"

"鮮度が落ちないうちに
手早く調理にかかるわ。
今回もありがとう！"
